about_the_game:
Continue your adventures in the ruins! This wrecked version of the Urban Modern Interiors tileset gives you plenty of dirty, damaged household furniture, shop goods and empty shelves to help you tell any story from urbex deep dives to war-torn cities.

The Urban Decay Interiors Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

* Water, green/toxic water, 3 carpets, marble floor, multiple wood floors, many designs of tile and grungy, dirty overlays to make everything even more ruined!

Walls/roofs:

* Brick, concrete, painted walls, wood panel, bookshelf and more! 24 styles in all.

Also includes (in dirty and wrecked versions):

* Household furniture – beds, tables, desks, vanity, kitchen table and chairs, sofas, wall hangings, kitchen tiles, office tiles, bathroom fixtures and more
* Gym setup with punching bags, treadmills, weight lifting, yoga mats and more
* Arcade tiles – includes old-fashioned arcade cabinets, ping pong table, jukebox and more
* Salon tiles – chairs, makeup, styling equipment, etc
* Jewelry shop with several display types
* Clothing store with various rack styles
* Grocery/convenience store – checkouts, aisle markers, produce displays, drink coolers, bakery goods, hotbox, drink dispensers, restaurant tables and more
* Hardware store and garage – tires, air compressors, tools, hose reels, work carts, shelving, lumber stacks, ladders
* Music equipment
* and more!

Also includes tiles from our Ruins Kit! Add overgrowth, holes, cracks, graffiti and more!

Events and Animations

Animated doors with lit and unlit versions.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

Also includes (in dirty and wrecked versions):
